globalMetadata._description: Cloudflare.NET SDK - A comprehensive C# client library for the Cloudflare REST API. Manage DNS, Zones, R2 storage, Workers, WAF, and security with strongly-typed .NET code.
globalMetadata._keywords: Cloudflare .NET, Cloudflare C#, Cloudflare SDK, Cloudflare API, .NET client library, C# Cloudflare, DNS management, R2 storage, WAF rules

_description.articles/getting-started.md: Get started with Cloudflare.NET SDK. Learn how to install, configure, and make your first API call to Cloudflare using C# and .NET.
_description.articles/zones/dns-records.md: Manage Cloudflare DNS records with C#. Create, update, delete, and list DNS records programmatically using the Cloudflare.NET SDK.
_description.articles/r2-client.md: Use Cloudflare R2 object storage with .NET. Upload, download, and manage files using the S3-compatible Cloudflare.NET.R2 client.
_description.articles/configuration.md: Configure Cloudflare.NET SDK. Set up API tokens, rate limiting, resilience options, and multi-account support in your .NET application.
_description.articles/api-coverage.md: Cloudflare.NET API coverage. See all supported Cloudflare API endpoints for DNS, Zones, R2, WAF, Workers, and security features.
